statements: SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM Students WHERE grade='A';
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM Students ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT student_name, grade FROM Students WHERE attendance_record=true;
SELECT student_id, performance_data FROM Students WHERE student_id=3;
SELECT * FROM Students ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT student_name, grade FROM Students WHERE grade='A';
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE attendance_record=true AND grade='B' ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT student_id, performance_data FROM Students WHERE student_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT DISTINCT grade FROM Students WHERE attendance_record=true;
SELECT student_name, grade FROM Students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Performance WHERE test_score > 80;
SELECT student_name, grade FROM Students ORDER BY grade DESC;
SELECT student_name, test_score FROM Students JOIN Performance ON Students.student_id = Performance.student_id;
SELECT student_name, exam_score FROM Students JOIN Performance ON Students.student_id = Performance.student_id WHERE exam_score < 70;
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE grade > 80 ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT student_name, attendance FROM Students WHERE attendance = true;
SELECT student_name, test_score, exam_score FROM Students INNER JOIN Performance ON Students.student_id = Performance.student_id;
SELECT student_name, test_score, exam_score FROM Students INNER JOIN Performance ON Students.student_id = Performance.student_id WHERE test_score > 70;
SELECT student_name, test_score, exam_score FROM Students INNER JOIN Performance ON Students.student_id = Performance.student_id WHERE exam_score < 60 ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT student_id, course_id, grade FROM Grades WHERE student_id = 123;
SELECT student_id, date, is_present FROM Attendance WHERE is_present = TRUE;
SELECT course_id, student_id, grade FROM Grades ORDER BY grade DESC;
SELECT * FROM Performance WHERE exam_id = 456 AND score > 80;
SELECT student_id, MAX(grade) AS highest_grade FROM Grades GROUP BY student_id;
SELECT * FROM Grades WHERE grade >= 90;
SELECT student_id, MAX(grade) AS max_grade FROM Grades GROUP BY student_id;
SELECT student_id, COUNT(*) AS num_courses FROM Grades GROUP BY student_id HAVING num_courses > 3;
SELECT student_id, AVG(grade) AS avg_grade, COUNT(*) AS num_courses FROM Grades GROUP BY student_id HAVING avg_grade > 80;
SELECT student_id, exam_id, score FROM Performance WHERE score < 60 ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT name, grade FROM Students WHERE grade > 80;
SELECT student_id, subject, score FROM Grades ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT exam_name, result FROM Performance WHERE result < 60;
SELECT student_id, date FROM Attendance WHERE is_present = true;
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE grade > 80 ORDER BY name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT name, grade FROM Students WHERE attendance = TRUE ORDER BY grade DESC;
SELECT subject, AVG(score) AS average_score FROM Grades GROUP BY subject HAVING AVG(score) > 70;
SELECT Students.name, Performance.exam_name, Performance.result FROM Students INNER JOIN Performance ON Students.student_id = Performance.student_id WHERE result > 90 ORDER BY result DESC;

SELECT Students.name, Attendance.date, Attendance.is_present FROM Students INNER JOIN Attendance ON Students.student_id = Attendance.student_id WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Students ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT student_name, grade FROM Students WHERE grade > 80;
SELECT student_name, course_name FROM Students JOIN Enrollments ON Students.student_id = Enrollments.student_id JOIN Courses ON Courses.course_id = Enrollments.course_id;
SELECT MAX(score) AS max_score, test_name FROM Performance GROUP BY test_name;
SELECT student_name, date, status FROM Students JOIN Attendance ON Students.student_id = Attendance.student_id WHERE date = '2022-01-08';
SELECT student_id, student_name, grade FROM Students WHERE grade > 90;
SELECT student_name, grade FROM Students WHERE student_id = 3;
SELECT student_name, course_name FROM Students JOIN Enrollments ON Students.student_id = Enrollments.student_id JOIN Courses ON Enrollments.course_id = Courses.course_id;
SELECT student_name, test_name, score FROM Students JOIN Performance ON Students.student_id = Performance.student_id WHERE score >= 80;
SELECT date, status FROM Attendance WHERE student_id = 2 ORDER BY date DESC;
